name: Elkins James Melvin
description: am looking for a friend at the present time to share my dreams and hopes with. I am an outdoor kind of guy who enjoys simply everything about life. I enjoy family time, dancing, fishing, camping, swimming, BBQing, shows, dancing, and just about everything. God plays an important role in my life. He h gives me strength to do all things. I like to travel all over the world. My job requires this of me, but I also like to travel on my leisure time.this what I like in a good friend,caring, compassionate, love,and honest, If interested please feel free to send me a message, if you are a scam don’t bother to check my profile because I’m going to report you , hope to meet the right person at this right time, God bless u.
